EmailTemplate.name: 18-TEPS-Utilities Moderniz.-Email-CEPSI Invitation-T00262.Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Communication innovations for new business models at CEPSI
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Join us at CEPSI 2018
17 – 22 September, 2018 CEPSI 2018 is almost here, and this year the innovations are even more exciting. Join us at CEPSI at the Kuala Lumpur Convention Center in Malaysia on 17 - 22 September, 2018 to see how cognitive, adaptive communications can modernize your grid and enable new business models. Meet us at our Booth 5000 to find out:
- how analytic applications can help you maximize value from your processes, people and assets. - about trans-continental test lab capabilities, from the University of Strathclyde and Nokia, that can help you effectively manage transformation risk and tune new technologies to your business. - more on the latest innovations in communication solutions that enhance the integration and management of renewable energy. Key CEPSI 2018 Conference Sessions Utility of the Future A Bell Labs Perspective
Distribution and Advanced Network Technical Conference Session
Grid or No Grid? Future Energy Discussions
Business Transformation Technical Conference Session
Adapting Electricity Distribution for the Future
Smart Grid and New Technology Technical Conference Session
Conference Keynote Session - Wednesday Register for CEPSI 2018 <[[https://mcimalaysia.eventsair.com/cepsi2018/registration/Site/Register]]> © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia.
